item.title: Wilderness/safezone help!
item.dc:creator: @i0b_0n i0b 0n
item.description:
@i0b_0n wrote:

You have a PVP server?
Well then declare this

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } return false; }
Then in all your attack methods (magic,melee,ranged)
add if !isInWilderness(){ sendMessage("You need to be in wildy ;p"); return; }
Here , you go =P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2009, 02:15:00 pm[/size][hr]Well not really sure about that if statement , don’t use it. I think ive forgot attackingon2.!isinwilderness() , well I’m not sure. and that dont contain wildy lvl diff . but the boolean is 100% currect.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2009, 02:23:28 pm[/size][hr]Look my serv : http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/8174/aboutserver1.png

Read full topic
